name: Jian Lou 0001
content: Jian LouSearch this siteEmbedded FilesSkip to main contentSkip to navigationJian LouAssistant ProfessorSun Yat-sen UniversityEmail: jian.lou@hoiying.net (Primary) or louj5@mail.sysu.edu.cnOfficial webpage at SYSU: [Link]Updated: August 2025I am now an assistant professor at Sun Yat-sen University, with a lot of help from my former advisor, labmates, and friends. I was a Postdoc fortunately and gratefully hosted by Prof. Li Xiong at Emory University from 2019 to 2021. I work on privacy-preserving machine learning and data analytics. I have a PhD in Computer Science and a BSc in Mathematics. I am looking for Undergraduate Research Interns and Postdoctoral Fellows. If you are interested, please send me your CV at jian.lou@hoiying.net.News and ActivitiesOctober 2025: I will serve as a Senior PC member for WWW 2026 (Security & Privacy Track).October 2025: I will serve as an Area Chair for ACL ARR.August 2025: I will serve as an Area Chair for ICLR 2026.August 2025: One paper is accepted to ACM CCS 2025.July 2025: Our paper won a best paper award at ACISP 2025!July 2025: I will serve as a PC member for ACM CCS 2026.July 2025: I will serve as a Senior PC member for AAAI 2026.June 2025: One paper is accepted to USENIX Sec.May 2025: Three papers are accepted to ICML 2025.May 2025: One paper is accepted to IJCAI 2025.November 2024: I will serve as an Area Chair for ICML 2025.October 2024: I will serve as a PC member for ACM CCS 2025.October 2024: Our paper won a distinguished paper award at ACM CCS 2024!August 2024: One paper is accepted to IEEE TDSC.August 2024: I will serve as a Senior PC member for AAAI 2025.Publications* denotes student
